mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, t.team_num, t.team_rename_image, t.team_name, t.field_num, f.field_name, t.team_limit, t.team_local, t.team_act_day, t.team_fee, t.team_act_week, t.team_act_time, t.team_level from tb_team t join tb_field f on t.field_num = f.field_num where team_recruit = 'Y' order by team_num desc) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
select count(*) from tb_team where team_recruit = 'Y'

select * from (select t.team_num, t.team_name, t.team_intro, t.team_leader_intro, t.team_original_image, t.team_rename_image, t.team_level, t.team_local, t.team_act_day, t.team_act_week, t.team_act_time, t.team_fee, t.team_limit, t.field_num, f.field_name, m.team_member_leader, m.user_no from tb_team t join tb_field f on t.field_num = f.field_num join tb_team_member m on t.team_num = m.team_num where team_member_leader = 'Y') where team_num = #{team_num}
mapper.insert: insert all into tb_team (team_num, team_name, team_original_image, team_rename_image, team_level, team_local, field_num, team_limit, team_act_day, team_act_time, team_act_week, team_fee, team_intro, team_leader_intro, team_recruit) values ((select max(team_num) +1 from tb_team) , #{team_name}, #{team_original_image}, #{team_rename_image }, #{team_level}, #{team_local}, #{field_num}, #{ team_limit }, #{team_act_day}, #{team_act_time}, #{team_act_week}, #{team_fee}, #{team_intro}, #{team_leader_intro}, 'Y') into tb_team_member (team_member_no, team_num, user_no, team_member_leader, team_member_date) values((select max(team_member_no) + 1 from tb_team_member), (select max(team_num) +1 from tb_team), #{user_no}, 'Y', sysdate) select * from dual
mapper.select: select * from (select * from (select rownum rnum, t.team_num, t.team_rename_image, t.team_name, t.field_num, f.field_name, t.team_limit, t.team_local, t.team_act_day, t.team_fee, t.team_act_week, t.team_act_time, t.team_level from tb_team t join tb_field f on t.field_num = f.field_num where team_recruit = 'Y' order by team_num desc) where team_level like '%' || #{ team_level } || '%' and field_name like '%' || #{ field_name } || '%' and team_local like '%' || #{ team_local } || '%' and team_name like '%' || #{ team_name } || '%' and team_act_day like '%' || #{ team_act_day } || '%') where rnum between #{ startRow } and #{ endRow }
